page.title: 12A DAY IN THE LIFE OF A CHILD
page.content: My name is Susan Bell. I live on a farm called Farness. There are six of us in the famly, I have three brothers. Usually I get up at twenty past seven and get washed and dressed for half past seven. School starts at 9.15a.m.Usually at school in the morning we get some English and some Maths, then we have interval at 10.45 We go in again at 11.15. Then sometimes we get History, Geography, Art or Project work.Our lunch interval is from 12.30 to 1.30p.m. We then go back in and work till 3.30p.m. When I get home it is about five past four when I do my homework before going out to play. After supper at six o'clock I go to play again. I go to bed at nine o'clock. One of my brothers goes to bed at the same time as me because he gets up earlier than I do.
